document.discussion_title: Pills found at Prince's estate contained fentanyl: official
document.topic_text: Several pills taken from Prince's estate in Paisley Park after his death were counterfeit drugs that actually contained fentanyl -- a synthetic opioid 50 times more powerful than heroin, an official close to the investigation said Sunday. »
